catentdesc.name: Unsalted Butter
catentdesc.longdescription: Butter is made from churning fresh cream or milk. It is used as a spread or condiment or topping for steamed vegetables or in baking and cooking. Taste the difference butter makes.

catentdesc.name: Skim Milk
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fresh and delicious fat free skimmed milk.
catentdesc.longdescription: Fat free skim milk. Fresh and creamy tasting without the fat. A great way to save calories while still enjoying the creamy freshness of milk.

catentdesc.name: Blue Cheese
catentdesc.longdescription: Not for the faint of heart, Oxford Organics strong blue cheese is a delicious and creamy cheese with the perfect bite. It's great in salads, on cooked beef, or on a cheese plate.

catentdesc.name: Parmesan Cheese
catentdesc.longdescription: An essential Italian hard cheese made of cows milk. Parmigiano-Reggiano can only be produced in certain regions of Italy. Grate it on pastas and salads or even pizzas.

catentdesc.name: Brie
catentdesc.longdescription: Nicknamed the 'Queen of Cheeses,' Brie is creamy and delicious, perfect on a fresh French baguette. To experience its full flavor, Brie is best enjoyed at room temperature. Try with Madisons Choice whole wheat crackers today.

catentdesc.name: Yogurt
catentdesc.longdescription: The healing powers of yogurt are well known and plentiful. Yogurt is full of probiotics and antioxidants which are excellent for the immune system. delicious fruit on the bottom wildberry yogurt.

catentdesc.name: Jumbo Brown Eggs
catentdesc.longdescription: Grade A jumbo sized organic brown eggs. Eggs are an incredible super food, loaded with nutrients, vitamins and protein. Fry, scramble, boil or poach them or use them in baking or when making a quiche.

catentdesc.name: Certified Organic 2% Milk
catentdesc.shortdescription: Organic and full of flavor 2% milk.
catentdesc.longdescription: Organic 2% milk. Fresh and creamy, from grass fed cows. Antibiotic and growth hormone free. Comes in 750 ml bottles. A great source of calcium for everyone.

catentdesc.name: Appenzeller Cheese
catentdesc.longdescription: A classic Swiss cheese which gains its unique flavor from being bathed in a mixture of herbs, liquors and wines for over four months. Best served with nuts and light white wines. Serve it at your next dinner party and really impress your guests!
